attributes.action: wave access to human rights for paedophiles, rapists and murderers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This country has no deterrent system any more. Prisons are full of offenders who will never be rehabilitated (the whole point of going there in the first place). The benefit of having the option of capital punishment is that maybe just a few of the criminals may think twice before committing the crime. Also the law abiding citizens would not have to pay to home the repeat offenders of sick sex crimes and murder as they could be sentenced to death. At least then the jails would have room to house those convicted of the more nuisance crimes and maybe do some good with them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
